member.name: M:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.CompoundFileHeader.#ctor
member.summary: Create a CompoundFileHeader with default values.

member.name: T:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry
member.summary: Directory Entry Structure The size of each directory entry is exactly 128 bytes.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.NameBuffer
member.summary: Character array of the name of the entry, always 16-bit Unicode characters, with trailing zero character (results in a maximum name length of 31 characters)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.NameDataSize
member.summary: Size of the used area of the character buffer of the name (not character count), including the trailing zero character

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.EntryType
member.summary: Type of the entry: 00H = Empty 03H = LockBytes (unknown) 01H = User storage 04H = Property (unknown) 02H = User stream 05H = Root storage

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.NodeColor
member.summary: Node colour of the entry: 00H = Red 01H = Black

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.LeftChildDID
member.summary: DID of the left child node inside the red-black tree of all direct members of the parent storage (if this entry is a user storage or stream), ¨C1 if there is no left child

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.RightChildDID
member.summary: DID of the right child node inside the red-black tree of all direct members of the parent storage (if this entry is a user storage or stream), ¨C1 if there is no right child

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.MembersTreeNodeDID
member.summary: The directory organises direct members (storages and streams) of each storage in a separate red-black tree. DID of the root node entry of the red-black tree of all storage members (if this entry is a storage), ¨C1 otherwise

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.UniqueIdentifier
member.summary: Unique identifier, if this is a storage (not of interest in the following, may be all 0)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.UserFlags
member.summary: User flags (not of interest in the following, may be all 0)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.CreationTime
member.summary: Time stamp of creation of this entry. Most implementations do not write a valid time stamp, but fill up this space with zero bytes.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.LastModificationTime
member.summary: Time stamp of last modification of this entry. Most implementations do not write a valid time stamp, but fill up this space with zero bytes.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.FirstSectorID
member.summary: SID of first sector or short-sector, if this entry refers to a stream, SID of first sector of the short-stream container stream, if this is the root storage entry, 0 otherwise

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.StreamLength
member.summary: Total stream size in bytes, if this entry refers to a stream, total size of the shortstream container stream, if this is the root storage entry, 0 otherwise

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.DirectoryEntry.UnUsed
member.summary: Not used

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.FileTypeIdentifier
member.summary: Compound document file identifier: D0H CFH 11H E0H A1H B1H 1AH E1H

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.FileIdentifier
member.summary: Unique identifier (UID) of this file (not of interest in the following, may be all 0)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.RevisionNumber
member.summary: Revision number of the file format (most used is 003EH)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.VersionNumber
member.summary: Version number of the file format (most used is 0003H)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.ByteOrderMark
member.summary: Byte order identifier: FEH FFH = Little-Endian FFH FEH = Big-Endian

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.SectorSizeInPot
member.summary: Size of a sector in the compound document file in power-of-two (ssz), (most used value is 9 which means 512 bytes, minimum value is 7 which means 128 bytes)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.ShortSectorSizeInPot
member.summary: Size of a short-sector in the short-stream container stream in power-of-two (ssz), (most used value is 6 which means 64 bytes, maximum value is sector size in power-of-two)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.UnUsed10
member.summary: Not used

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.NumberOfSATSectors
member.summary: Total number of sectors used for the sector allocation table

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.FirstSectorIDofDirectoryStream
member.summary: SID of first sector of the directory stream

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.UnUsed4
member.summary: Not used

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.MinimumStreamSize
member.summary: Minimum size of a standard stream (in bytes, most used size is 4096 bytes), streams smaller than this value are stored as short-streams

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.FirstSectorIDofShortSectorAllocationTable
member.summary: SID of first sector of the short-sector allocation table, or ¨C2 (End Of Chain SID) if not extant

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.NumberOfShortSectors
member.summary: Total number of sectors used for the short-sector allocation table

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.FirstSectorIDofMasterSectorAllocationTable
member.summary: SID of first sector of the master sector allocation table, or ¨C2 (End Of Chain SID) if no additional sectors used

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.NumberOfMasterSectors
member.summary: Total number of sectors used for the master sector allocation table

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.FileHeader.MasterSectorAllocationTable
member.summary: First part of the master sector allocation table containing 109 SIDs

member.name: T:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.MasterSectorAllocation
member.summary: The master sector allocation table (MSAT) is an array of SecIDs of all sectors used by the sector allocation table (SAT).

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.SID.Free
member.summary: Free SID, Free sector (may exist in the file, but is not part of any stream)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.SID.EOC
member.summary: End Of Chain SID

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.SID.SAT
member.summary: SAT SID, Sector is used by the sector allocation table

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.CompoundDocumentFormat.SID.MSAT
member.summary: MSAT SID, Sector is used by the master sector allocation table

member.summary: This record specifies the width and default cell formatting for a given range of columns.

member.summary: Index to first column in the range

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.COLINFO.LastColIndex
member.summary: Index to last column in the range

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.COLINFO.Width
member.summary: Width of the columns in 1/256 of the width of the zero character, using default font (first FONT record in the file)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.COLINFO.XFIndex
member.summary: Index to XF record for default column formatting

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.COLINFO.OptionFlags
member.summary: Option flags

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.COLINFO.NotUsed
member.summary: Not used

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DATEMODE.Mode
member.summary: 0 = Base date is 1899-Dec-31; 1 = Base date is 1904-Jan-01

member.name: T:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DBCELL
member.summary: contains relative offsets to calculate the stream position of the first cell record for each row in each row block.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DBCELL.FirstRowOffset
member.summary: Relative offset to first ROW record in the Row Block

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DBCELL.FirstCellOffsets
member.summary: relative offsets to calculate stream position of the first cell record for the respective row

member.name: T:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DEFCOLWIDTH
member.summary: This record specifies the default column width for columns that do not have a specific width set using the records COLWIDTH, COLINFO or STANDARDWIDTH.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DEFCOLWIDTH.Value
member.summary: Column width in characters, using the width of the zero character from default font (first FONT record in the file).

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DIMENSIONS.FirstRow
member.summary: Index to first used row

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DIMENSIONS.LastRow
member.summary: Index to last used row, increased by 1

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DIMENSIONS.FirstColumn
member.summary: Index to first used column

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DIMENSIONS.LastColumn
member.summary: Index to last used column, increased by 1

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.DIMENSIONS.UnUsed
member.summary: Not used

member.name: T:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.EOF
member.summary: Indicates the end of workbook globals, a worksheet, a chart, etc.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.Height
member.summary: Height of the font (in twips = 1/20 of a point)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.OptionFlags
member.summary: Option flags

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.ColorIndex
member.summary: Colour index

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.Weight
member.summary: Font weight (100-1000). Standard values are 0190H (400) for normal text and 02BCH (700) for bold text.

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.Escapement
member.summary: Escapement type: 0000H = None 0001H = Superscript 0002H = Subscript

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.Underline
member.summary: Underline type: 00H = None 01H = Single 21H = Single accounting 02H = Double 22H = Double accounting

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.Family
member.summary: Font family: 00H = None (unknown or don't care) 01H = Roman (variable width, serifed) 02H = Swiss (variable width, sans-serifed) 03H = Modern (fixed width, serifed or sans-serifed) 04H = Script (cursive) 05H = Decorative (specialised, for example Old English, Fraktur)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.CharacterSet
member.summary: Character set (used by all cell records containing byte strings)

member.name: F:SMC.Framework.SpreadSheet.BinaryFileFormat.FONT.Name
member.summary: Font name
